pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dirattatirattaṃ senāya vasamānā uyyodhikampi balaggampi senābyūhampi anīkadassanampi gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.3: Aññataropi chabbaggiyo bhikkhu uyyodhikaṃ gantvā kaṇḍena paṭividdho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.5: “kacci, bhante, suyuddhaṃ ahosi, kati te lakkhāni laddhānī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.6: So bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamāno maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.8: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā uyyodhikaṃ dassanāya āgacchissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.9: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṃ, ye mayaṃ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā uyyodhikaṃ āgacchāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.10: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.11: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.12: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṃ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.13: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyodhikaṃ dassanāya gacchathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.16: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, uyyodhikaṃ dassanāya gacchissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.19: “Dirattatirattañce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.6: ettakā hatthī, ettakā assā, ettakā rathā, ettakā pattī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.8: ito hatthī hontu, ito assā hontu, ito rathā hontu, ito pattikā hontu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.11: Tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīkaṃ, tayo assā pacchimaṃ assānīkaṃ, tayo rathā pacchimaṃ rathānīkaṃ, cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī pacchimaṃ pattānīkaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.14: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.17: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.2.3: bhikkhussa ṭhitokāsaṃ vā nisinnokāsaṃ vā nipannokāsaṃ vā āgantvā sampahāro dissati,
